result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason Nils Carlson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:36 Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in court with attorney T. Gregory Amann.  Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in custody.  William Harold Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 15FO199 heard at this time. THorie: amended information filed, charging 1 count of misd theft and asking for time served. Dismiss 15FO199. Amann and Def agree.   Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Def pleas guilty to charge in amended information.   COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS. Court finds and adjudicates Def guilty of amended charge as alleged in the amended information. Thorie and Amann address sentencing.  Court: orders time served.  Dismiss 15FO199.  Appeal rights are given to the defendant. 1:44
Plea hearing on July 10, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

The Court reviews the bond conditions with the defendant. Court verifies the DOB, address and phone # with the defendant.

04:02 Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in court, in custody VIA VIDEO CONFERENCING FROM PCJ. Atty Liesl Nelson appears via phone for the defendant. Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant missed pre-trial conference. PDs office will be involved. Atty Nelson requests signature bond reinstated. Froelich addresses the court, requests $2000 cash bond and that defendant can be released for medical reasons/mental health treatment. Court orders $200 cash bond, quashes warrant. 04:16  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 2, 2017 at 04:30 pm.

Information Filed with the Court and a copy is given to the defendant.   Defendant has a copy of the information  and waives reading of the information. Defense stands mute. Court states that response is taken as a not guilty plea.      Not guilty plea received by the court.                    Atty OSullivan no modification of bond. Atty Nero requests bond be amended to signature bond. Court modifies bond to $10,000 signature bond.   Pretrial Conference to be set for Sept 20, 2016 at 11:30 a.m.

11:49 Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in court with attorney Adam P Nero.  Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in custody.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Collin Gilles is sworn & exam by Atty OSullivan. Deputy Gilles id's defendant Jason Nils Carlson. Xexam by Atty Nero. Redirect by Atty OSullivan. Atty OSullivan gives argument. Atty Nero gives argument & objects to bind over.   The court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for further proceedings.

4:14 Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in court  VIA VIDEO CONFERENCING FROM PCJ, in custody.  Sean Edward Froelich appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Adam Nero appeared in court.  Froelich addresses missed court appearances.  Atty Nero responds; requests a signature bond. Froelich: requests a $250 cash bond. Nero objects to cash bond. Def to provide a mailing address and phone number to the PCJ and Clerk of COurt.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 4, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: for Defective Complaint Lack of Probable Cause filed by Atty Schwab

Attorney Donald J. Schwab in court.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is not present bu notified the Clerks office that he fell off bike and broke knee cap.  OSullivan requests a bench warrant. Court authorizes the bench warrant.  If court gets a medical report regarding the medical condition of the defendant it will reset the hearing.
Preliminary hearing at 03-04-2016 09:00 am

3:30 Defendant Jason Nils Carlson in court with attorney Donald J. Schwab.  William H. Thorie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Schwab addresses missed court appearance; requests signature bond be reinstated. Thorie requests a $1,000 cash bond. Court reinstates signature bond and goes over bond conditions with Def.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.

03:04 Attorney Donald Schwab in court for defendant Jason Nils Carlson.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Schwab addresses the court regarding charge. Defendant being charged criminally for same instance.  Schwab requests reopening while other case is being settled and this case can follow the CF case.  O'Sullivan agrees. Court grants motion, vacate judgment, reopen case and this case will follow with 15CF179.
Pre-trial conference at 02-09-2016 10:30 am

03:15 Attorney Donald J. Schwab in court.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason Nils Carlson not in court.  O'Sullivan requests rescheduled preliminary hearing.  Schwab states that Defendant wishes to obtain private attorney.  Schwab suggests scheduling a pre-trial, O'Sullivan agrees.  Court will set pre-trial with the purpose of scheduling a preliminary hearing.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 10:30 am.
